name: Jamagotchi
description:
IT'S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE!! ...Okay, fiiiiine. It's exactly what it looks like. Another knock-off Tamagotchi. It even has 4 buttons, just like a real fake Tamagotchi... Well, at least it's cute...

Anyways, the controls are as follows:

The Arrow Keys

...No really that's it. Just use the arrow keys to navigate the menus. Up is up, down is down, right is select, and left is back. It's that simple.
